name: Gmoll Farm
description:
The year is 2342. The human race has gone extinct, and only a single Gmoll remains in the concrete, trash-filled wasteland that once was known as Earth. Using only his bucket, shovel, and his remarkable digestive system, he must survive on this planet and rebuild his civilization.

Press G to grab items, D to drive vehicles (actually just a bike), E to eat items, and W to wear items (actually just a sombrero hat thing). Wait for organic materials to rot, then combine them with worms to make soil. Eat an apple core to obtain seeds, and then plant the seeds to grow an apple tree.

Features:

-Infinite, procedurally generated world!

-Lots of cool items!

-Lots of game objectives!

-Great music!
